metadata.title: CVE-2021-46238 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v1.1.0 was discovered to contain a stack overflow via the functiongf_node_get_name () at scenegraph/base_scenegraph.c. This vulnerability canlead to a program crash, causing a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
